name: Red Sports Car
description: Experience the thrill of speed with this sleek red sports car toy. It comes with realistic details and smooth wheels for a smooth ride.

name: Yellow Race Car
description: Race against your friends with this vibrant yellow race car toy. It's designed for speed and agility, providing endless fun on the racetrack.

name: Blue Monster Truck
description: Get ready for some off-road adventures with this powerful blue monster truck toy. It features oversized wheels and a sturdy construction for rough terrains.

name: Green Pickup Truck
description: Load up and deliver goods with this green pickup truck toy. It has a realistic design, working doors, and a spacious cargo bed for all your hauling needs.

name: Yellow Fighter Jet
description: Take to the skies with this amazing yellow fighter jet toy. It has realistic detailing, retractable landing gear, and movable wings for high-flying action.

name: Red Propeller Plane
description: Pilot your own adventures with this classic red propeller plane toy. It features a spinning propeller, a cockpit that opens, and a vintage-inspired design.
